column4: Hello, I have trouble updgrading to Edgy. I did a clean install of 6.06 and did gksu "update-manager -c" and updates files, and I also tried sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
But it didn't updgrade to Edgy
I was having an error upgrading as well today.  What is your error, specifically?
it just updates files, and needs to reboot but nothing is really changed
